version_description: Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version. Now works with Apple Watch & Android Wear devices.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.

Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Includes new features (available on certain models) such as Extra Care navigation, cleaning statistics, Find Me, robot software update via Neato app, and support for new products Neato Botvac D3 Connected and Neato Botvac D5 Connected robots.  Minor other fixes and enhancements are available in this version.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.
Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Minor fixes and enhancements are available in this version.

Neato brings you continuous improvements with every app update. Includes new features (available on certain models) such as Cleaning Summary with Coverage Map and Cleaning History for the last 21 cleaning runs. Minor other fixes and enhancements are available in this version.

Neato Robotics continues to delight by promoting social, visual, vocal and touch options with the latest app:
• Get social and share your map (with Botvac Connected 2.2.0 software)
• VoiceOver for accessibility guidance
• 3D Touch for quick access to Help and Shop (requires iPhone 6s or newer)

Fixes and other updates to boost performance and stability are also added in.

• Choose your area measure unit (square meters or square feet)
• Rotate your coverage map (for Botvac Connected and its 2.2.0 software only)

Fixes and other updates to boost performance and stability are also added in.

• New app design for better usability across all Connected models
• Robot dashboard with spotlight on your primary robot for quick view and access
• Visually appealing with choice animations for an engaging experience

Botvac D5 Connected and Botvac D3 Connected now support:
• Cleaning Summary with a Coverage Map that shows where your Neato robot cleaned.*
• Cleaning History graph with statistics.*

*Requires a robot software upgrade to version 4.0 which is available via an over-the-air update.

Neato app updates include performance and stability improvements, as well as general enhancements.

Neato Botvac D7™ Connected now supports virtual No-Go Lines, which tell your robot where not to go.*

Other enhancements include:
• iPhone X design compatibility
• Availability in Panama, Colombia, and Guatemala
• User experience and performance improvements

*Requires a robot software upgrade to version 4.1, available over the air.

Neato Botvac D7™ Connected now supports virtual No-Go Lines, which tell your robot where not to go.*

Other enhancements include:
• iPhone X design compatibility
• Availability in Panama, Colombia, and Guatemala
• User experience and performance improvements

*Requires a robot software upgrade to version 4.1, available over the air.
User experience and performance improvements
Addresses a potential crash that may occur on the home screen.

* Botvac D7 Connected now offers multiple floor plan support so you can use No-Go Lines on additional floors.*
* Running low on power? The quick boost feature lets Botvac D7 Connected return to the charge base, get the right amount of charge to resume cleaning and finish the job fast.   
* Additional user experience and performance improvements

*Requires a robot software upgrade to version 4.2 which is available via an over-the-air update.
Updated links and translations.
User experience improvements.

• Support for Botvac D6 Connected and Botvac D4 Connected
• Additional user experience improvements

• Neato Botvac D7™ Connected now supports zone cleaning - clean specific areas on-demand*
• Additional user experience improvements

*Requires a robot software upgrade to version 4.3.1, available over the air.
Bug fixes
• Bug fixes and user experience improvements
• Bug fixes and user experience improvements
• Bug fixes and user experience improvements.
Important iOS 13 compatibility update which is required to pair the robot.

• Enables Siri Shortcuts with your iOS device or HomePod for Neato robot vacuums
• With Siri Shortcuts, use voice commands to start cleaning, pause cleaning, and send your robot vacuum back to its base
• Neato D7 users can use voice commands with Siri Shortcuts to clean zones
• Other bug fixes
